title: Fantasy Forge Jewelry Rainbow Chain Spinner Ring Stainless Steel 8mm Comfort Fit Band Sizes 3-17
features: The rainbow chain spinner ring is made of solid 316L stainless steel.

This ring is designed for those moments when you need stress relief or to relax, relieve tension, calm your nerves, and focus. The rainbow PVD plated chain will spin around the band giving, you something to fidget.
The band has a high polish finish, is 8mm wide, and a comfort fit style.
This rainbow chain spinner ring is currently available in sizes 3, 4, 5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 8, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, and 17.
